thread.section_title: HDIS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HDIS | www.hdis.com | 2 of 112
thread.title: Donella

author: Donella
title: Donella
text: The group of people that work at HDIS are the best. I have had issues with incontinence for years, every since I had rectal cancer. It's hard to find coverage that makes you feel secure and confident to do your daily routine. I had a box of samples sent to me at the suggestion of HDIS and it was the best thing I could have done. I tried on all the samples and found a couple of styles that fit comfortably and do the job I need to feel secure. It's very nice to know that people actually care about you and try so hard to help you. My sincerest thanks to HDIS! Life is good!
